An all-time classic which is a must for nostalgic gamers.

It certainly does look dated now, but Half-Life's combination of action and problem solving along with a decent storyline means that I will happily play through the single player campaign time and time again in future years.

Multiplayer on Steam is still active but don't expect to more than a handful of servers, many of them repeatedly running the Crossfire map.

Ah lala.. Half Life. Un univers bien plus qu'énorme. Même si les développeurs n'ont pas conscience qu'ils ont crée une histoire formidable, il faut jouer a HL1. Je ne vous cache pas qu'il est long et chiant. Mais rien que pour l'histoire et la suite qu'il réserve ( HL2 ), il faut y jouer.
For a game that came out in 1998, the graphics aren't that bad, but I didn't like the graphics much. Still a good game with good story and gameplay.

Легенда. Игра, которая заинтересовала меня движком. Игра, у которой я не забуду сюжет. Игра, для которого до сих пор делают моды. Игра, где до сих пор играют в мультиплеер. И игра, которая просто шутер от первого лица. Но какой же этот шутер, великолепный

Время от времени выходят игры, которые поднимают игровую планку своего жанра чуть выше, заслоняя все то, что считалось эталоном данного жанра. Происходит это, конечно, не так уж и часто, как этого хотелось бы нам, геймерам, но зато ожидание окупается с лихвой. Half-life получился именно такой игрой, ставшей в последствии культовой. Именно он стал первым детищем тогда еще мало кому известной компании Valve, и он её и прославил. Получив множество наград от различных журналов и издательств, Half-life заложил принципы, которые успешно экплуатируются даже в современных шутерах от первого лица.

В итоге, Half-life получился очень интересным и захватывающим проектом. Атмосфера держит в напряжении до самого конца, поэтому пару кирпичей да отложить придется. Нет сомнений, это лучший шутер своего времени.
Nagyon jó!
s

Many people will tell you Doom, Wolfenstein, Goldeneye-64 or even Quake, the programing engine that partially CREATED this very game, is the sheer defenition of a first person shooter. But I say, Half-life nearly CHANGED and DEFINED the defenition and ARCHITECTURE behind a first person shooter! A game where you can hold near and dear to your heart. Sure the graphics don't LOOK phenomenal, groundbreaking or realistic, BUT! I myself have not had the direct expirience of living in '97 '98 and expiriencing this game for the first time. In my mind, It sure is built well. A true recommendation to people with an adrenaline rush, the fight for justice, and seek for true adventure! Number one on my top ten games. A true recommendation. But what are you reading this for? Go on, play the game! Misssster Freeman...
Bla-bla-bla mrFreeman lambda

Half Life is revolutionary game. There are alot of aspects of this game that I liked and few that I didnt like about the game.

I'll start off listing the positives: 
+ Great Story.
+ Graphics are stunning for its time.
+ Valve made this.
+ Levels are all very unique
+ A strong 10 hours of gameplay.


Here are some negatives that come to mind:
- I got lost sometimes.
- Movement feels like you are sliding on ice.
- Some muddy textures.
- Hard to see buttons that are required to progress.

Overall this is a great game and I forsure recommend it to anyone.
My Rating: ★★★★☆

One of the most influencial fps ever and it aged pretty well 8\10
Просто

Half-Life is definitely not for everyone, not today when players are not used to outdated graphics and higher difficulty. It's undoubtedly a great game. It's different from everything I've ever played. I decided to play it on medium difficulty because why not? I am used to playing shooters after all. Hell, it was so frustrating, sometimes. Not because the enemies would be that hard to kill, they were not, but because I got lost and didn't know how to continue and while I was going through all the rooms again to find my way out, I fell down here, lost a bit health there and after some time I couldn't continue without loading an older save to try to play that part again and to be more careful this time.

In chapter 6, Blast Pit, I totally lost clue about what to do next. I was struggling to motivate myself to keep playing. But then I found those amazing walkthrough videos made by BigMacDavis and he and his love for Half-Life made me want to continue. I really have to recommended them because it helps you, it's fun and very nice to listen to.

After chapter 6 I started to love the game more and more. I got several new weapons, also unique ones, which were fun to use and very effective. The use of different weapons for different enemies was very satisfying. Valve did a really good job there.

If you like sci-fi and shooters and don't care about nicest graphics. If you want action without too many dialogues and if you don't get easily frustrated. Or if you just want to know why this game is so popular, give it a chance. It's worth of it!

When you get a game really cheap, as i did in this case, you don't tend to think to highly of it. Why is it cheap? What's the reason for so much discount? Those are the things that went through my mind, and i gotta say, the only answer i could come up with, was the fact that the game is super, super old! Despite the age of the game and the not so up-to-date graphics, this game blew me away! Such a well made game in so many ways, you can really tell why people say the half life series paved the way for future FPS games. You play as Dr. Gordon Freeman, a physicist who must fight his way out of a secret underground research facility, take on aliens from another dimension whilst more or less everything around him goes wrong! What more could you want!! So, if you want an older game thats better than a lot of the games of present, you should 110% try this game and the added content out. It feels like you're a part of history! Fun, good storyline and takes a decent amount of time to complete! 10/10

You know, ever since I was introduced to halflife, I wanted to play it. I don't regret playing it. It is fun, hard at some parts, but thats what makes it fun. Even if the graphics are bad, its valves first game, so why judge? If you don't have it, don't read this reveiw, Go on. Buy it :).

Half-life, VALVe's crowning jewel of FPS's
You are a mexican researcher working under Black Mesa, you are Gordon Freeman, after a horrible experiment goes wrong, you need to escape Black Mesa, but this mysterious person in a tie keeps following you
The gameplay is great, this was the game that revolutionized FPS's after all, you shouldn't think less of it
This game inspired VALVe's best series', such as Team fortress and Counter-strike
Overall: a great game from a great generation

A  ak sa už vám nechce sa hrať Half Life 1 s takou starou grafikou tak odporúčam Black Mesu. Skoro celá hra je prerobená do Source Enginu okrem Xenu na ktorom sa ešte pracuje. Being a new gamer on the pc I wanted to start with a classic and I definietly found one. Half-Life was both fun and challanging. There where a few times this game surprised me. At first the game is straight forward next thing you know your face to face with teleprting alians and the military. Luckly you have a crow bar and your HEV suit. I can see why so many people love this game. After beating Half-Life1 I can see why so many people where so impatiant for Half-Life2. I can't wait to play it my seff.
still one of the best fps games in the world.

About Half-Life:

I have not played Half-Life until now. I have not even played any horror shooters or console games of the 20th Century. (Also, I'm a coward) So I don't really know how to judge Half-Life in terms of the tech of its time, and I was originally skeptical if I would get my moneys worth.

But I know its a great game. Even on Easy Mode, its a intense and stressful(I dont play it at night, the headcrabs!(also it gave me nightmares)) experience. The atmosphere and enviroment is immersive. I could think Black Mesa is a good place to work, except for its poor layout, in office-ey terms. The enemy A.I is good. Although there's not as much guns as some other games out there, each weapon has its own stragety and abilites for attacking enemy strongholds.

And now, I know why this game is a classic.

Just like the description says: Run. Shoot. Think. Live

Es dificil valorar un juego de hace tantos años tan importante como este. Al estar acostumbrado a juegos con gráficos impresionantes, texturas a alta resolución, mecánicas complejas... al jugar a Half Life sientes que te falta algo. También añadir los numerosos fallos que he encontrado a lo largo de la campaña que han empeorado un poco mi experiencia de juego. En cuanto a cosas positivas claramente la sencillez y importancia de esta saga. Las diferentes situaciones en que te pone, la dificultad general del juego (no es nada fácil), el que este doblado en español (algunos juegos actuales no lo están) y su potencia gráfica (sobre todo respecto a las animaciones faciales). También añade un poco de chicha el poder escojer al final del juego. En resumen bastante divertido pero incompleto a mi gusto. Definitivamente me quedo con Half Life 2!

While it may not be as amazing as Half-Life 2, this game sure as hell is still awesome. Worth checking out even if the graphics are dated because the gameplay, AI, level design and pretty much everything else is all fantastic.

Original, but still packed with combat and action in this Sci-Fi story in Black Mesa labratory.  Lots of unique alien and zombie creatures.  Including a few bosses too!  Amazing game when it was released.  Even has sequels such as the great Half-Life 2!

A lot has been said about this game since its release in 1998 and, really, there is almost nothing bad you can say about it after all these years...
Total masterpiece!
Yeah... after 17 years the graphics and sounds seem outdated even with the HQ Texture Pack, but for those of you who are looking for modern visuals, there is the Black Mesa mod For HL2.
If you havent played it you definetely should! Why you'd ask... Here's why:

Pros:
+Good Story
+The Level Design and Puzzles
+Excellent Gameplay
+Good Mutiplayer (still fun)
+The Price

Cons (If any of them can be considered such):
-Old Grapics
-Some Bad Sounds
-Unclear Dialogues
-Wacky Controls at Times

10/10 - A brilliant and timeless masterpiece!

[h1]Decided to give this game a go and I have no regrets[/h1]

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[*]Story, really well done and you don't get lost
[*]Gameplay, controls are simple and not a tussle to work with
[*]The variety of weapons keeps the gameplay fresh and gives you new ways or slaughtering enemies
[*]Enemy variety
[*]Hidden supplies, in rooms/boxes
[*]Boss battle, an actual boss battle and not something half-assed 
[*]The ending is good, so many questions arise and keeps you wanting for more
[/list]
[h1]Cons[/h1]
[*]Graphics, aren't the best but the game is from 1998
[*]Some missions you can get confused in about where to go or do because there is no indicator so listening to the scientists' dialogue is very important
[/list]

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
That's about all I can say, it's fun and interesting and suggest that you also give it a go, try to get it when it's on sale considering it's an old game. Hopefully this review helped you.
El clasico Half-Life. Un poquito sobrevaluado para mi gusto. Pero buen juego. Se banca bastante la prueba del tiempo

If I'm impressed by a 1998 game in 2015, surely this caused a lot of hype when it came out. Gameplay, story, music, and art are enough to make this game immersive despite the outdated graphics. I recommend it, and if you're deciding whether to buy this or the one on Source, there is very little difference between the two, except maybe the Source version has better water effects and shadows but it has some bugs that the original Half-Life doesn't.

Un clásico de la época del 98.. Recuerdo a ver lo jugado por primera vez en una maquina con Windows 98 en casa de un amigo, donde en esos tiempos el que tenía un ordenador era lo máximo y hoy en día jugarlo sigue siendo lo mejor.

Una historia, jugabilidad, gráficos, armas y enemigos de lo mejor de la época.. Que hoy en día luego de muchos años se sigue jugando.. La verdad que este título fue y seguirá siendo uno de mis favoritos!..

Sin duda recomendable, una compra clara y precisa para tu colección en tu biblioteca de Steam.. Además al mismo juego te brinda mucho más por la comunidad que tiene, donde te dan una variedad increíble de mods, texturas y lo mejor que es el Multiplayer que luego de varios años sigue activo!..

Recomendable hoy y siempre!.. Gracias por leer mi análisis, un saludo desde Chile: D
The game that started it all, very good voice acting and atmosphere, and if your bored you can download some mods like crack life, I reccomend this game

the original Half Life is an amazing singleplayer experience that revolutionized first person shooters and PC gaming. Though now considered a retro game, it still holds up as a fun adventure.
PROS:
-great pacing
-awesome and creative weapons
-memorable chapters and enemies (screw the military in this game)
-simple controls to learn the hang of
CONS:
-lots of slippery running and jumping. If you aren't use to pseudo-ice physics than you will not be able to control Freeman
-bad voice acting and mediocre npc AI
All in all this is a fantastic game that every steam user should have the chance to play at some point. I have yet to experience Half Life 2 but hopefully it is as good if not better than the original.
10/10 would doom the entire human race to play again
Amazing.

Günümüz oyunlarının gelmesini sağlayan küçüklüğümüzün oyunu. 2015 yılında bile halen girip Multi-player oynuyorum. Çıktığı yılda büyük bir satış gösteren Half-Life gerek hikayesi, gerek oynanışı ve gerek grafikleri bakımından (Günümüz grafiklerine çok denk olmasada) harikaydı. Valve'nin çıkardığı ilk oyun günümüzde efsane olarak geçiyor. Seri olarak yapılan bu oyunda oyuncular üçüncü oyunu  bekliyor. Oynamadıysanız mutlaka oynamalısınız. Şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum.
İyi Oyunlar
Half life. Descrito por muchos como la mejor saga de la historia y un juego que impresiona teniendo en cuenta cuando salió, largo y muy muy entretenido. Una obra de arte.

Gra, która wyznaczyła nowe standardy nie tylko FPSom, ale grom w ogóle.
Dzisiaj wygląda archaicznie, ale potrafi przykuć na długie godziny.
Wrogowie pomimo tylu lat dalej potrafią zaskoczyć inteligencją i stosowanymi taktykami by nas dorwać.

Warto wybulić parę ojrosów zarobionych na CeeSie i zagrać razem z dodatkami aczkolwiek nie każdemu może się ta gra spodobać. 

Ja popełniłem błąd, poniewać najpierw zagrałem w Half Life 2 razem z epizodami przez co osłabiło to moje doznania z jedynki. Ale trzeba było zobaczyć w końcu co wydarzyło się, że pojawił się ten cały Kombinat w dwójce :D

Достоинства:
Захватывающий сюжет проработанный геймплей отличная графика для того времени.

Недостатки:
не обнаружено;

Эту игру еще помню с самого детства, как только мне приобрели компьютер и с тех самых пор я просто не могу пропустить выхода ни одной части приключений Гордона Фримена - физика - теоретика. Просто поражающий своей неповторимостью, оригинальностью и в то же время неповторимостью сюжет не оставит ни одного человека равнодушным. Зомби, коллапс при работе с ядерными материалами - тут интерес как для физика, так и для простого фантазера. 
Монстры и военные - кровопролитные сражения. А Так же путешествие по галактике пришельцев. Великолепный сюжет! 
Разнообразные виды фантастического оружия и довольно продолжительный сюжет смогут увлечь вас ан пару дней путешествия по черной мезе. Отличная, хоть и старенькая игра.



Общее впечатление: Завораживающий сюжет!

Even though this game is now 17 years old, it is awesome. Yes the graphics are from another decade but the story and gameplay is superior to many games that have come out of as of late. I highly recommend this game, and I cannot wait to start the second in the series.

One of the best campaigns, ever. the last boss is bullshit but the rest of the game is just a masterpiece, in every way, good level design, fun weapons, decent multiplayer, Half Life has everything you can ask.

Half Life Oyunu 1998'de çıktı. 2005 serisinde haberlerde bu oyun Gösterildi ve efsane oldu 2000 Doğumlu Biriyim. Oyun oynamaya ilk 4 oyun ile başladım (Call Of Duty 1 / Half life / Counter Strike 1.5 / Knight Online) bunlar ilk pcyi aldığım zaman oynadıgım oyunlardı Oyun o kadar efsaneki Hala Oynuyorum. sene kac olmuş Grafikleri Benim İçin Ve Yılına Göre Çok İyi. HL1'de Takıldığınız Yerlerde İpucu vb şeyler yok Oyunu İyice Ezberlemek için Bizim Bulmamız lazım Doğru Yolları Ve Gayet Güzel Olmuş Çünkü Eğer İpucu Olsaydı şuan bu oyunu 3saatte bitirmiştim. ilk bitirdiğim zaman:18 Gündü. Multiplayer moduda herzaman güzeldi Yani Demek İstediğim Bu Oyun Efsanedir Ve Hep Efsane Kalacaktır. Değerlendirmiyorum Çünkü Oyun O kadar Güzel ki Değerlendirilcek Eleştirilcek bi Yanı yok Oyunun. Ama yeni Nesil 2003-2004 yılları bu oyunu asla sevmeyecek. yani 2001-2002 ve 2000liler son efsanevi sevenlerdi bence. HL1'den küçükken cok korkardım heleki oyuna Giriş Bölümü :D Zombilerden/yaratıklardan Korkardım. CSGO/Arma 3/GTA V Gibi Oyunlar HL1'in yerini asla Tutamayacaktır.
It is very old, but its very entertaining, if you are going to buy this game, i recommend you to buy the valve complete pack (it is expensive, but its worth the money), it has an awesome story mode

Un gran clásico, un shooter de antología que tiene una gran historia y es muy inmersivo. Si se lo juega por primera vez se puede pensar adquirir el remake Black Mesa que promete mejorar todo aspecto de éste título. 10/10

simplemente, es un juego que a envejecido muy mal, y que solo compre para ponerme con la segunda parte cuanto antes, pero despues de unas cuantas horas, el juego se me hace pesado, no por su historia la cual es muy interesante, pero la jugavilidad es malisima que tira pa atras al final me acabe viendolo que me faltaba pa completar por youtube.

Juegazo :D

Para avaliar esse jogo, você tem que se imaginar jogando ele na época que saiu, porque nos dias atuais como o povo só pensa em gráficos, vai achar tosco, mas deixando os gráficos de lado, você se depara com uma história, que mesmo você não manjando de inglês consegue entender o básico para jogar esse game, e que game de tirar o folego.
Os controles são fáceis de aprender, principalmente se você já jogou algum FPS, em alguns momentos, você tem que apertar o shift para o personagem andar em vez de correr, tem tantas armas que algumas eu nem cheguei a usar rs.

Está mais que recomendado, principalmente se você assim como eu, jogou o Half-Life 2 primeiro, e não esse.

What can you say about this game, that has not have been said before? If this game was a book, it would be on the same level of all the well known and garnished classics like Pride and Prejudice, Animal Farm and Lord of the Rings. If it was a movie, it would be equal to the Godfather movies or Ciztizen Kane. Play it! It's an absolute, essential must have. Without this masterpiece, there would not be Half Life 2, no Steam and dare I say it, PC gaming as we know it today.
